title: A Red ribbon
creator_credit: Marc De Rossi, Patricia De Rossi, Pedro Jose Frank Nemeth and Ard Norddeutscher Rundfunk
brief_description: A non-narrated story with simply a musical score background about a young boy’s unsuccessful attempts to fly a kite. Discouraged he gives up and goes home. However, his female companion comes to his rescue with the aid of her red hair ribbon which she attaches to the tail of the kite. A sensitive film that raises issues about the value of friendship and co-operation. Music by Vincente Salvia. Cast: Ledice Fernandes de Oliviera, Marcos da Silva. Suitable for primary school level.
